      algorithms.misc.Complex[][][][] getConvolutionResults()
      list of convolution results by scale and orientation angle accessed as [nOrientation][nScale][nRows][nCols] (NOTE that this can be null if user did not want to store it).
      double[][] getMaximumMoment()
      Maximum moment of phase congruency covariance, which can be used as a measure of edge strength

      • getThinned

        public int[][] getThinned()
        get the thinned phase congruence image, a.k.a. the edge image. Note that the array is accessed as a[row][column].

      • getPhaseCongruency

        public double[][][] getPhaseCongruency()
        return the gradient image produced by phase congruency as a double array of values in range 0 to 1.0. Note that the array is accessed as a[nOrientation][row][column].
        Returns:
        the phaseCongruency

      • getOrientation

        public double[][] getOrientation()
        return the orientation image. Note that the array is accessed as a[row][column].
        Returns:
        the orientation

      • getPhaseAngle

        public double[][] getPhaseAngle()
        return the phase angle image. 
         Local weighted mean phase angle at every point in the image. 
 A value of 
                pi/2 corresponds to a bright line, 
                0 corresponds to a step and 
                -pi/2 is a dark line.
        Note that the array is accessed as a[row][column].
        Returns:
        the phaseAngle

      • getThreshold

        public double[] getThreshold()
        Returns:
        the threshold

        Returns:
